item.description:
Hi All,

I've been told on good authority that this is a great local run especially if you're training for a spring marathon...

http://www.cmsrun.org...

30k which is approx 18.5 miles and there's also a relay option.

Our very own Renee said these very words about it so it must be good... "I *loved* this race. Lots and lots of hills & just when you think the hills are over, at mile 18, they throw in steepest hill of them all. It's one of those races that makes you ask yourself "what the hell just happened??" Plus, they give out Twinkies at the end."

Please indicate on here if you're willing to offer a ride to people too...

p.s. as always, you're responsible for registration fees, safety etc.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Stu's 30k run and relay... "running for Twinkies"
